titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing, for Bruce's information, a letter from John Adam, Secretary to the Government at Fort William [Calcutta], to Francis Warden, dated 2 December 1815, which in turn forwards a letter from the Earl of Moira to James Morier, discussing the behaviour of Persian troops towards Bruce and other British subjects during the recent conflict.
